content:
Given your new requirement of returning to London by April 16th, I've adjusted the itinerary to allow for more time with your friends in Nice:

Day 1 (April 3): London to Harwich

* Distance: 90 miles / 145 km
* Driving time: 2 hours

Day 2 (April 4): Hook of Holland to Amsterdam

* Distance: 57 miles / 92 km
* Driving time: 1.5 hours

Day 3 (April 5): Explore Amsterdam

Day 4 (April 6): Amsterdam to Luxembourg City, Luxembourg

* Distance: 230 miles / 370 km
* Driving time: 4.5 hours

Day 5 (April 7): Luxembourg City to Lucerne, Switzerland

* Distance: 245 miles / 394 km
* Driving time: 4.5 hours

Day 6 (April 8): Lucerne to Lake Como, Italy

* Distance: 125 miles / 201 km
* Driving time: 3 hours

Day 7 (April 9): Lake Como to Nice, France

* Distance: 234 miles / 377 km
* Driving time: 4 hours

Days 8-11 (April 10-13): Enjoy time with friends in Nice

Day 12 (April 14): Nice to Lyon, France

* Distance: 292 miles / 470 km
* Driving time: 4.5 hours

Day 13 (April 15): Lyon to Reims, France

* Distance: 314 miles / 505 km
* Driving time: 5 hours

Day 14 (April 16): Reims to London (via Calais and Eurotunnel)

* Distance: 273 miles / 440 km
* Driving time: 5 hours (excluding Eurotunnel crossing time)

Total distance for the entire journey (outbound and return trips): 2,059 miles / 3,316 km

This itinerary provides you with four full days to spend with your friends in Nice and ensures you return to London by April 16th. Please note that driving times and distances are approximate and may vary depending on traffic and road conditions. Enjoy your road trip!
